articles.author: John Miller, Patricia Weiss
articles.title: Drugmakers rush to test whether vaccines stop coronavirus variant - Reuters
articles.description: At least four drugmakers expect their COVID-19 vaccines will be effective against the new fast-spreading variant of the virus that is raging in Britain and are performing tests that should provide confirmation in a few weeks.
articles.content: ZURICH/FRANKFURT (Reuters) - At least four drugmakers expect their COVID-19 vaccines will be effective against the new fast-spreading variant of the virus that is raging in Britain and are performing… [+2782 chars]
